altTitles.zh: 学園殺人ゲーム Dead Tube

description.en: Distributing thrilling videos in secret! A school game that puts life and death on the line!
description.ja: 映画研究部に所属する業得学園2年・町谷智浩は学園トップクラスの美少女・真城舞に、ある日突然、声をかけられる。なんでも2日間だけ、24時間完全密着の撮影をしてほしいとのこと。同行する町谷だったが……!?
description.kk: Мектеп оқушылары киноклубта не түсіреді? Күнделікті өмірдің бөлшектері, әуесқой қорқынышты фильмдер... бұның бәрі зеріктіріп жібереді... бірақ бұл жолы емес! Басты кейіпкер Томохиро Мачиге, киноклуб операторы, мектептегі қыз бірнеше күнге оны түсіруді ұсынады. Ол ерекше ынталы емес болсада, бірақ ол да бас тартпайды. Егер жігіт бұл оның өміріндегі ең қызықты және қорқынышты фильм болатынын білгенде...
description.ru: Что могут снимать школьники в клубе любителей кино? Зарисовки из повседневности, любительские фильмы ужасов… скука полная… но только не в этот раз! Главному герою Томохиро Мачии, оператору киноклуба, одна девушка из школы предлагает поснимать её несколько дней. Он особо не горит желанием, но и не отказывается. Если бы парень только знал, что это будет самый захватывающий и будоражащий фильм в его жизни…

description.en: In the distant past, the prosperous nation of Karma waged war against the nation of Spectra, resulting in the creation of an AI that wiped out all humans. Centuries later, Raye, the last surviving human, lives amongst an android society on the outskirts of Karma. On the night of her 13th birthday, her peaceful life is upended when Spectra attacks, destroying her home and forcing her friends to the front lines. Desperate to save everything she loves, Raye calls upon humanity's last bastion: "Sky Striker", the Karma-developed secret technology made to turn humans into the ultimate living weapons.… Unexpected, right? In this newest adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh, the focus of the plot is not on the card game, but instead the many storylines featured in the cards. The first arc surrounds the Sky Striker series, with more to come in the future.
description.ja: 世界で唯一生存する人間・レイはAIたちと平和に暮らしていた。しかしある日、敵国の攻撃が街を襲う。AIたちを守るため、レイは「閃刀姫」へと覚醒する―…!!
description.pt-br:
No passado distante, a próspera nação de Kama travou uma guerra contra a nação de Spectra, resultando na criação de uma IA que eliminou todos os humanos. Séculos depois, Raye, a última humana sobrevivente, vive entre uma sociedade de andróides nos arredores de Kama. Na noite de seu aniversário de 13 anos, sua vida pacífica é interrompida quando Spectra ataca, destruindo sua casa e forçando seus amigos a irem para a linha de frente. Desesperada para salvar tudo o que ama, Raye invoca o último bastião da humanidade: "Força Celeste", a tecnologia secreta desenvolvida por Kama feita para transformar humanos em armas vivas definitivas.

... Inesperado, certo? Nesta mais nova adaptação de Yu-Gi-Oh, o foco do enredo não está no jogo de cartas, mas sim nas muitas histórias apresentadas nas cartas. O primeiro arco envolve a série Força Celeste, com mais por vir no futuro.

altTitles.de: Ich würde mir gerne eine Freundin ausleihen

altTitles.th: สะดุดรักยัยแฟนเช่า

altTitles.vi: Dịch Vụ Cho Thuê Bạn Gái

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.
- Official English Volumes: [Kodansha USA](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.ja: 都内在住のダメダメ大学生、木ノ下和也（20）。ある日、“ワケアリ”の超絶美少女、水原千鶴との出会いをキッカケに、彼の人生は大きく変わり始めて──！？
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.es-la: Kinoshita Kazuya es un estudiante universitario normal al que su novia acaba de dejar por otro chico. Sintiéndose deprimido, decide usar una aplicación llamada Diamond para contratar a Mizuhara Chizuru, una novia de alquiler, para sentirse mejor. Desde su primer encuentro con ella, parece ser la chica perfecta para él, pero ¿hay más en ella de lo que parece? ¿Y cómo se desarrollará su relación no muy típica?
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

title.en: Hyouketsu Reijou-sama wo Follow Shitara, Mechamecha Dekiai Sareteshimatta Ken

altTitles.en: The Case Where I Followed the Freezing Lady and She Doted on Me Like Crazy

altTitles.ja: 氷結令嬢さまをフォローしたら、メチャメチャ溺愛されてしまった件

description.en:
『The Overwhelming Adoration of the Sweethearted Lady!』 

Alicia Ozrind, known in noble circles as the Frost Duchess, is feared for her cold and unyielding demeanor, earning her the reputation of a villainess among the aristocracy. But beneath her icy exterior lies a girl who simply struggles to express her true feelings. There is, however, one person who has melted her frozen heart—a young servant named Gray, who works as a cleaner in her grand estate. 

"You’re the only one who truly understands me!" 

Completely smitten and vulnerable around Gray, Alicia showers him with unrestrained affection. Whether it’s during meals, in the bath, or even before bedtime, her overwhelming sweetness knows no bounds! But their relationship isn’t without its hurdles—Alicia is a noble lady, and Gray a mere commoner.

Will Gray manage to endure the relentless love of this endearing aristocrat? This is a sugary-sweet, heart-melting romantic comedy set in a fantasy world!

altTitles.vi: Thánh Nữ Cecilia và Mục Sư Lawrence

description.en:
What’s a priest to do when the Saint he’s tasked to take care of is…a  klutz? One thing’s for sure…every day is bound to be lively!

Saint Cecilia is beloved by the townspeople — not only is she elegant and composed, she benevolently shares her wisdom with all who seek it. That is, until the last person has left — at which point she becomes totally hopeless!

Only Pastor Lawrence is keeping the Saint put together enough to do her duties… and though she may test him, it’s all in a day’s work!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10178/episode/324516) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/2256-saint-cecilia-and-pastor-lawrence-1-4)
description.vi: Thánh nữ Cecilia có một bí mật - đó là cô sống hoàn toàn phụ thuộc vào Lawrence, mục sư của nhà thờ. Ngoài ra cô còn có một tình cảm bí mật đối với Lawrence, nói bí mật cho oai thế thôi chứ ai cũng biết riêng chỉ có Lawrence là không biết thôi

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

altTitles.ja: クマとウサギは友達ではいられない

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.

**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

altTitles.th: วันนี้ที่ระเบียง

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

title.en: I Rely on My Harem to Conquer the World

description.en: Young Li Haoran tragically died after being ruthlessly betrayed by his teammates in a battle against demonic beasts. However, when he opens his eyes again, he finds himself reborn as the Blood Demon King in a tribe full of succubi. On top of that, he has acquired a special system that allows him to grow stronger simply by building a harem. This time, he will seize the opportunity, forge himself into a true demon, and lead his harem to conquer the world!

St Dorothea's Academy is a prestigious all girls' school with top scores and rich history. It's famed for the strong bonds which the students share with each other, known for being eternal. Every year, two friends with the closest bond are chosen to represent the school and guide their fellow students. They are known as "les reines du printemps." With flowers being scattered, a game of friendship and betrayal starts…

Li Jian, the adopted son of a mob boss, has been forcefully locked up in a cemetery by Min Zhao, the son of a deranged killer.

“Are you after some ransom money? Just call my wife, she’ll pay whatever you ask.”

 “To the rest of the world, you’re already dead. I can do whatever I want with you.” 

Li Jian raised his hands and struck Min Zhao’s injury. Wincing in pain, Min Zhao retaliated by slapping Li Jian across the face.

“Do you really hate me this much? I saved your life, and this is how you thank me?”

“Do you expect me to be grateful, you psycho?!” Li Jian fires back.

“No matter what, you’re not leaving me. You’re safer here.”

description.de:
Ein mysteriöser Mann erscheint plötzlich in einer Wüste, welche den Ost- und Westkontinent trennt. Der Junge Yulian Provoke vom Pareia-Stamm findet diesen Mann und bringt ihn in sein Dorf. Es stellt sich heraus, dass der Mann eine extrem starke und erstaunliche Person ist und er fängt an, den jungen Yulian zu trainieren.

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)
description.en:
A mysterious man suddenly appears in the desert separating the East and West Continents. A young boy, Yulian Provoke from the Pareia tribe finds this man, and brings him to his village. Turns out the man is an incredibly strong and amazing individual, and he begins to teach the young boy fighting skills.

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)
description.fr:
C’est décidé, il deviendra le plus grand guerrier du désert ! À l’âge de 15 ans, notre héros fait la rencontre d’un maître duquel il souhaite tout apprendre. Manier les armes à la perfection, s’élever spirituellement, tuer les monstres… Il sera alors prêt à venger sa tribu ! Seulement, l'entraînement s’avèrera bien plus difficile que prévu…

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)
description.ko:
사막의 찐득찐득한 모래바람과, 그곳을 질주하는 전사들의 이야기

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)
description.ru:
История берёт начало с того, что мальчик Юлиан Провок из Парейского племени встречает таинственного человека в пустыне между Восточным и Западным континентами, и приводит его к себе в деревню. 
Обнаруживается, что этот мужчина на самом деле невероятно сильная и удивительная личность. Вскоре он начинает обучать юношу боевым навыкам.

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)
description.pt-br:
"Grandes cavaleiros buscam a glória através de lutas contra monstros." Em um mundo cheio de monstros, nosso jovem protagonista encontra um homem perdido no meio do deserto, um homem que não fala a sua mesma lingua, um homem também muito poderoso e mestre em artes marciais… quais são os segredos por trás desse homem, e quais batalhas nosso protagonista irá enfrentar!?  

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)

altTitles.zh: 网游：神级刺客，我即是暗影

description.en: In a world where people sleep and enter the realm abandoned by God, Qin Feng, who had sacrificed everything for his sister, is betrayed by her. However, fate grants him a second chance, sending him back nine years before the abandoned world appears. This time, Qin Feng chooses to abandon his sister and focus on becoming the strongest.

title.en: The Dentist Won't Stop Teasing Me

description.en: After suffering from an unbearable pain caused by a wisdom tooth, Cai Tong'an visits the dentist, only to be greeted with a beautiful and gentle Dr. Xie Ruanqing. To her surprise, she turns out to be the senior she secretly admired during her university days...

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

altTitles.ja: 洒落にならないネット掲示板百物語～都市伝説コミック怪談集～

altTitles.en: Chilling Internet Urban Legends: A Horror Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja-ro: Hontou ni Kowai Net Keijiban Hyaku Monogatari: Toshi Densetsu Comic Kaidanshuu

altTitles.ja: 本当に怖いネット掲示板百物語～都市伝説コミック怪談集～

description.en: Featuring eerie urban legends that became popular on the internet, faithfully adapted into comics by skilled authors. A true horror anthology for urban legends!

altTitles.en: My First Girlfriend is a Gal

altTitles.pt-br: Minha primeira namorada é uma Gal!

altTitles.vi: Cô Bạn Gái Của Tôi Là Một Gyaru

description.en: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected.
description.ja: DT(童貞)を捨てたいと悩む高校生・羽柴ジュンイチ。ある日、「ギャルに土下座で頼めば卒業できる」という迷信を聞いて、ダメ元でクラスのギャル・八女に土下座で告白した所…まさかの大成功!? 見事付き合うことになるのだが、ビッチなのに身持ちは固い八女さんに、非リアな羽柴は弄ばれる毎日で…。果たして羽柴は「はじめて」から卒業できるのか!?
description.vi: Mùa xuân, mùa của tình yêu đã đến và có vẻ như việc tìm ra bạn gái của anh ấy khó hơn với Junichi. Để tìm ra cách, bạn của Junichi buộc anh phải thú nhận với cô gái, Yame Yukana. Tuy nhiên, mọi việc không diễn ra như anh mong đợi. và cái gì tới nó tới
description.pt-br: Junichi Hashiba é um jovem colegial virgem que está desesperado para perder esse status. Sob pressão de seus amigos, o garoto acaba se declarando para Yukana Yame. Surpreendentemente a garota aceita  e um casal é formado. Porém, Jun acaba se encontrando em águas desconhecidas com Yame, que é uma gyaru (um tipo de moda urbana japonesa). Enquanto ele fantasia em perder a sua virgindade, ela se mostra mais normal e inocente do que ele imaginava.

title.en: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka: Memoria Freese—Seiya no Musouka

altTitles.ja-ro: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか　～メモリア・フレーゼ～　聖夜の夢想歌

altTitles.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick up Girls in a Dungeon? Memoria Freese

altTitles.ru: Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье? Воспоминания Фриз

description.en: Manga based on DanMachi mobile game - MEMORIA FREESE

altTitles.en: Amano Megumi is Full of Gaps!
Amano Megumi is FULL of Openings!

altTitles.th: เรื่องหนักอกของอามาโนะ เมกุมิ!

altTitles.ja: 天野めぐみはスキだらけ!

description.en: Shindo Manabu is a student at a very prestigious high school whose goal is to get into Tokyo University. He studies constantly and tries to never lose sight of that goal. That is until his childhood friend, Amano Megumi, who goes to the same school starts to distract him. He originally only remembered her as the tomboy she was as a kid, until he notices how "developed" she has become. As these two get closer to each other, hilarity often ensues and subsequently, Manabu becomes more and more distracted from his goal of getting into Tokyo U.
description.ja: 剣道に打ち込む体育会系ぷに子・めぐみと、東大志望のひょろ長男子・学──幼なじみの二人は中学で疎遠になるも、同じ高校に進学して再び距離を縮めはじめた。プラスとマイナス、N極とS極──真逆な二人は引かれ合う…？
description.pt-br: Shindo Manabu é um estudante de uma escola de ensino médio muito prestigiada cujo objetivo é entrar na Universidade de Tóquio. Ele estuda constantemente e tenta nunca perder de vista este objetivo. Isso até que sua amiga de infância, Amano Megumi, que frequenta a mesma escola, começa a distraí-lo. Ele originalmente só se lembrava dela como a moleca que ela era quando criança, até perceber o quão “desenvolvida” ela se tornou. À medida que esses dois se aproximam, a hilaridade geralmente acontece e, posteriormente, Manabu se torna cada vez mais distraído de seu objetivo de entrar na Universidade de Tóquio.

title.en: Koi ni Koi suru Koibito Kankei

altTitles.ja: 恋に恋するコイビト関係

altTitles.en: Becoming Her Lover For the Sake of Love

description.en:
Asako Ichijou, the student council president at a prestigious girls' high school, has been racking her brain about the ladykiller Nagi Tenma. That's the sort of person Asako is, but Nagi discovers Asako has broken school rules by bringing a shoujo manga to school...

Asako pleads with Nagi to keep it a secret, and Nagi reveals her condition: "Become my lover."

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)

altTitles.th: จันทราประกาศิต

description.en:
Gekko Iwasaki, a high-school student, is selected as executor of "Moonlight Ordinance" and fights against the residents. In this fairy tale, there is a world which is strangely affected by blue moonlight once in dozens of years. "Moonlight Ordinance" is a rule to restore the world to its former condition.   
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ufujitakazuhiro?lang=ja)

Twelve years ago, the powerful Nine-Tailed Demon Fox attacked the ninja village of Konohagakure. The demon was quickly defeated and sealed into the infant Naruto Uzumaki, by the Fourth Hokage who sacrificed his life to protect the village. Now Naruto is the number one knucklehead ninja who's determined to become the next Hokage and gain recognition by everyone who ever doubted him!
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Naruto". Uzumaki Naruto é um garoto que teve um demônio preso dentro dele quando era um bebê, para evitar que esse demônio destruísse sua vila. Ele cresceu sendo temido por todos, já que existe a lembrança dos mortos pelo demônio em quase todas as famílias. Evitado e ignorado, tudo o que ele realmente deseja é ser amado e reconhecido pelos outros, pelo que de fato ele é. Acompanhe a vida de Naruto, seu amor pela "doce e amável" Sakura e sua "amizade" com Sasuke... Uma história aparentemente simples, em que o herói acumula poderes e vence os malvados, fazendo amigos no caminho, certo? Errado. Naruto tem ação e comédia, sim, mas o tema central do mangá é a solidão e como cada um dos personagens lida com essa solidão. A leveza cômica de alguns capítulos é francamente contrastante com o clima pesado e trágico de outros.

description.en:
Atagoul Monogatari takes place in a fantasy world where humans and cats can talk to each other. 
The story revolves around the adventures of Hideyoshi, a big young cat, and his friends.

title.en: I Only Want to Beat You

altTitles.en: I Want to Beat You, Oh Roji
I Want to Defeat You, Oh Roji

description.en: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
description.uk: Головний герой Лі Ґіґо, який жодного разу в житті не програв, і головна героїня, яка перемогла його, О Роджі. Хто в підсумку стане переможцем в цьому «парі»?
description.es-la: El protagonista masculino que nunca ha sido derrotado en su vida 'gana', la heroína femenina 'solo' que hizo ese guiño pierde por primera vez ¿Quién será el ganador de esta 'apuesta'?

altTitles.ja: きみがローファーをはいたら

description.en: Rinne Miki is a normal first year's high school girl who loves fashion and is close with her friends. But, she has a caring personality too, so though she has opposite-sex friends, that never became romantic, and she lived her life without romance. But, on the day of the school festival, she meets Toma, a boy with a slightly mysterious atmosphere to him... though she's bewildered by how aggressively the younger boy approaches here, gradually, she starts to see him as...?
description.ja:
高校1年生の三木凜音はオシャレが大好きで友達想いな普通の女の子。
でも世話好きの性格もあって、異性とは友達にはなっても恋愛に至ることはなく、恋心とは無縁に生きてきた。
そんな彼女だが、文化祭の日にちょっと不思議な雰囲気の少年・冬馬と出会って…。
グイグイくる年下男子に戸惑いながらも、だんだんと凜音も冬馬のことが…？

title.en: Zense de Koroshita Aite no Tantou Henshuu ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 前世で殺した相手の担当編集になりました

altTitles.en: I Became the Editor in Charge of the Person I Killed in the Previous Life

altTitles.hi: മുൻ ജീവിതത്തിൽ ഞാൻ കൊന്ന വ്യക്തിയുടെ ചുമതലയുള്ള എഡിറ്ററായി ഞാൻ മാറി (Malayalam)

altTitles.vi: Trở Thành Biên Tập Viên Của Người Tôi Giết Kiếp Trước

description.en:
Saionji Miharuta has just been assigned as the new editor for the hot-selling novelist, Shinonome Jin. Shinonome is an author who's veiled in mystery and has never shown his face to the public. So, when Saionji went for their first meeting, he was shocked to find himself in his current life's greatest crisis!!

Was this reunion a fated one, or was it predestined!?

Adachi's second serialization in Gessan Shounen Sunday, follows the story of three siblings, students of Meisei Middle School. Takes place 26 years after Adachi's biggest title, Touch.  
  
Because of the legend left by Tatsuya Uesugi, Meisei Academy High School was well-known for their strong baseball team. But 26 years after their glory, the team has not been able to keep their record and has since lost their fame.  
  
Two stepbrothers, Souichirou and Touma Tachibana, aim to revive of the once-strong Meisei Academy baseball team and enter the National High School Baseball Championship.  
  
(Source: MAL, edited)
description.ja: 舞台は明青学園。同年同月同日に生まれた同い年の兄弟とひとつ違いの妹。上杉兄弟の伝説から２６年、運命の兄弟は今再び明青学園の扉を開く。そして、物語は始まる―――

description.en: In a world where humans are protected by the Chimera tribe as an endangered species. As he spends time with a human girl, a certain emotion begins to grow in the heart of a Chimera boy.....!

title.en: My Harem Consists Entirely of Female Demon Villains

altTitles.zh: 我的后宫全是反派魔女

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Hougong Quan Shi Fanpai Monü

description.en: I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!

A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma sacerdotisa formou seu primeiro grupo de aventureiros, mas, quase imediatamente se encontram em apuros pelos goblins. E o Goblin Slayer é quem vem ao resgate – um homem que tem dedicado sua vida a exterminação de todos os goblins, através de qualquer meio necessário.
description.ru: Юная жрица вместе со своей командой впервые отправилась на поиски приключений, но они тут же попали в беду. На помощь им приходит Убийца Гоблинов – таинственный мечник, посвятивший свою жизнь уничтожению всех гоблинов любыми средствами. В итоге девушка присоединяется к нему в постоянном походе против всевозможных пород гоблинов, в котором сталкивается с новыми тайнами, врагами, друзьями, а иногда и конкурентками.
description.vi: Một nữ tu sĩ trẻ đã thành lập nhóm phiêu lưu đầu tiên của mình, nhưng gần như ngay lập tức họ thấy mình đang đau khổ. Đó là Goblin Slayer đến giải cứu — một người đã cống hiến cuộc sống của mình cho việc tiêu diệt tất cả những yêu tinh, bằng mọi cách cần thiết. Và khi những tin đồn về những kỳ công của anh ấy bắt đầu lan truyền, thì không ai nói được ai có thể gọi tới...
description.pt-br: Um homem deseja tornar-se um “aventureiro”, cujo lema é: “Eu não vou salvar o mundo, eu apenas vou matar goblins.” Após ouvir rumores sobre ele, uma elfa se aproxima dele com um pedido.

title.en: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun (Mafia Alternate Universe)

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん if Episode of 魔フィア

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia

altTitles.vi: Iruma Giá Đáo!: IF Episode of MAFIA

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun: IruMafia Edition

altTitles.ko: 악마에 입문했습니다! if Episode of 魔fia

description.en: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?
description.ja: 暴力や犯罪は当たり前の貧民街-スラム-で育った心優しい少年・イルマ。瀕死状態で倒れていた、マフィア組織【バビル】のドン・サリバンを助けたことで、イルマの運命の歯車が動き出す！ マフィア組織【バビル】を中心に巻き起こる、マフィア・アクションコメディ！
description.vi: Spin-Off của tác phẩm"Mairimashita! Iruma-kun" theo hướng What-If, thế giới của tác phẩm lần này sẽ xoay quanh việc các nhân vật sẽ sống trong thế giới của các Mafia
description.es-la: ¡Un spin-off oficial de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun, en un universo alternativo en el que Iruma se convierte en un destacado miembro de la mafia. A pesar de tener sólo cinco años, Iruma ha visto muchas cosas como niño de la calle... ¡la más reciente, a un anciano desangrándose justo delante de donde vive! Como buen chico, Iruma se dedica a curar al anciano y no le da importancia. Sin embargo, cuando el anciano regresa de repente, se revela como Don Sullivan, ¡jefe de la organización clandestina conocida como Babyls! Se ofrece a adoptar a Iruma como su nieto, una oferta que Iruma se ve incapaz de rechazar...
description.pt-br: Os amados personagens de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun estrela neste spinoff baseado na máfia! O jovem Iruma salva um chefe da máfia ferido da morte... e então se torna seu neto!?

altTitles.ja: 学園アイドルマスター GOLD RUSH

description.en: The story of girls who attend a school where dreams come true!

altTitles.ja: 今日も来たんすか、依田先輩。

altTitles.en: Have You Come Again Today, Yoda-senpai?

altTitles.vi: Hôm nay chị lại tới nữa à, Yoda-senpai?

description.en: This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house. She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's. It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way, so she stays at my house almost every day. Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary, and I'm always on the edge of my seat!
description.ja:
**ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！**

俺の実家で、我が家のようにくつろぐこの女。 同じ高校の先輩で、姉の友達の依田燈。 学校まで片道2時間らしく、ほぼ毎日俺の家に居座っている。 無防備で少し抜けてる依田先輩に振り回されて、ドキドキしっぱなし!! ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

description.en: Even in modern Japan, ninja still hide in the shadows. Young ninja Yodaka has received his mission--protect high school student Aoi at all cost. But can a ninja survive the wild world of high school while also fulfilling his mission?
description.ja: 時は現代！世を忍び悪を討つ公安忍部隊のヨダカは、女子高生・向日アオイの護衛を命じられる。極端にコミュニケーションが苦手なヨダカは目立たず生徒となりアオイを護る予定が、何故か彼女と友達になり!?
description.pt-br: Mesmo no Japão moderno, os ninjas ainda se escondem nas sombras. O jovem ninja Yodaka recebeu sua missão: proteger a estudante do ensino médio Aoi a todo custo. Mas um ninja pode sobreviver ao mundo selvagem do ensino médio e ao mesmo tempo cumprir sua missão?

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

title.en: I Thought My Time Was Up!

altTitles.en: I Thought I Didn't Have Long to Live!

description.en:
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanchett, was told she only had three months left to live. She decided that she didn't want to go quietly, so she decided to create and complete her bucket list! 

1. Treat her maid Anne to cakes
2. Gain independence and wealth
3. Get rid of her fiancé, the Marquis of Secreb
4. Date someone handsome for three months
5. Take a trip to the West!

...But it was only after she ran away that she realised... the fact her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanche, was diagnosed with a terminal illness and three months left to live. She decided to try to achieve her bucket list since she was going to die anyway. First, dumping an older fiancé whom she doesn't even love. Second, dating the monster Duke of Candel for three months! But it was only after she ran away from him that she realized, the fact that her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=825581), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4502291)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9021824), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801711)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/haiyiwieshijuezheng/list?title_no=2313)
description.ko:
3개월 시한부 진단을 받은 공녀, 라리에트. 어차피 죽을 몸, 버킷리스트(라 쓰고 미친 짓이라 읽는) 달성을 해보기로 했다. 

첫째. 약혼자를 엿 먹이기. 
둘째. 괴물 공작 아스라한과 3개월 간 연애하기!  

그러나 그에게서 도망치고 나서야 깨닫고 말았다. 시한부 진단이 완벽한 오진이라는 사실을!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=825581), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4502291)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9021824), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801711)

**Official Translations:**

description.tr:
Leydi Lariet’e bir hastalık tanısı koyulmuş ve üç aylık ömrü kaldığı söylenmişti. “Zaten öleceğim, o halde aklımdan geçen her şeyi yapabilirim!” diye düşünen leydi, nişanlısına postayı koyup acımasız dükle bir ilişkiye başlamıştı. Olacakları işler çığırından çıkmadan önce bilemezdi. Aslında kendisine yanlış bir teşhis konulmuş, kısıtlı ömrü kalmamıştı! Bay Asrazan gülümsedi ve… “Şimdi kaçmaya çalışırsan bunun bedelini ödemek zorunda kalırsın.”

description.zh:
生命只剩最后三个月？
那我要和怪物公爵谈恋爱！
得知自己的生命只剩下三个月的拉丽爱特,想着反正自己活不长，索性在死之前完成自己的愿望清单!首先解决掉未婚夫老头儿，其次和怪物公爵埃斯拉翰谈三个月的恋爱!但逃离他身边之后，拉丽爱特才知道，自己的病竟然是…？!

The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

altTitles.zh-hk: 想盡情享受的常客小姐

altTitles.zh: 想尽情享受的常客小姐

description.en: Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?
description.ja: マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

description.en: A sequel to the successful baseball manga MAJOR by the same author. The series follows Gorou's son Daigo.

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.en: I'm a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped into a Gyaru

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um Garoto do Ensino médio, mas troquei de Gênero e Me Tornei uma Gal

description.en:
Junpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.
___
 [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja: 陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
description.pt-br:
Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

Class President's and Masochism Girl's Yuri

description.en: “Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
description.fr: Les "chimères" sont des personnes auxquelles on a infusé de l'ADN animal afin de leur donner des superpouvoirs et des capacités, mais la société ne les favorise pas, si bien qu'elles vivent dans la peur et le rejet. Notre personnage principal, dont le nom de code est "01", travaille comme un mercenaire qui tombe sur une vieille connaissance. Il est ensuite chargé de protéger et de transporter Enoch, une fille qui est recherchée pour être le "matériel" parfait, jusqu'aux frontières du Canada.
description.pt: “Quimeras” são pessoas que foram infundidas com DNA animal para receber superpoderes e habilidades, mas a sociedade os despreza e vivem marginalizados. Nosso protagonista, codinome “01”, trabalha como um mercenário e recebe a missão de proteger e levar Enoch, o “material” perfeito, à fronteira do Canadá.

altTitles.en: I Became a Legendary Archmage by Reading a Book

altTitles.pt-br: Me Tornei uma Arquimaga Lendária ao Ler um Livro

description.en:
I was reincarnated as a grimoire containing all the magical knowledge of another world.

Anyone who reads me can become a legendary archmage.

Please, just read me...
But no one is willing to open my pages.

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.ja-ro: Lv99 no Akujo ga Lv1 no Shujinkou wo Sodatemasu

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.zh: 前辈是男孩子 邂逅篇

altTitles.it: Al senpai piace vestirsi da ragazza

description.de: Die Highschool-Schülerin Aoi ist schwer verliebt in Makoto, ein superhübsches Mädchen, die die gleiche Schule besucht. Aber als Aoi ihren Mut zusammennimmt, Makoto ihre Liebe zu gestehen, nimmt die Geschichte plötzlich eine unerwartete Wendung: In Wirklichkeit ist Makato ein Junge, der sich als Mädchen verkleidet!
description.en:
Can true love really overcome any obstacles? Saki, a high school student, confesses her feelings to Makoto. Taken aback, Makoto reveals his secret, but the sudden discovery doesn’t seem to bother Saki who is already head over heels for him. After being rejected, Saki asks Ryuji, Makoto’s childhood friend, for some advice on how to win his heart. A love triangle unfolds when Ryuji realizes that he might also have some feelings for his old friend...

---

description.fr: Aoi, une élève de seconde, a eu le coup de coeur pour Makoto, une fille de 1ère super jolie. Mais quand Aoi prend son courage à deux mains pour se déclarer, Makoto lui fait une révélation inattendue... En réalité, c'est un garçon qui se déguise en fille !
description.ja: 男の娘が後輩に告白される話です。
description.ko:
하나오카 마코토는 귀여운 것을 아주 좋아하는 남자 아이.
어느 날, 마코토는 자신을 여자라고 착각하고 있는 여자 후배 사키에게 고백을 받는다.
거기에서 마코토는 자신이 남자인 것을 밝히지만 사키는 포기하지 않는다.
그 후에 마코토에 대해 특별한 감정을 품고 있는 류지와 3명 사이에서의 아련한 감정이 생겨난다.
description.ru: Десятиклассница Саки признаётся в любви одиннадцатикласснице, но та не спешит отвечать взаимностью. Всё дело в том, что Ханаока переодетый парень, и он уверен, что его общество принесёт Саки лишь проблемы. Однако Саки нисколько не разочаровывается, узнав правду, а наоборот полна решимости стать его первой любовью.
description.th: ฮานาโอกะ มาโคโตะ เป็นนักเรียน ม.ปลาย ที่ไม่ว่าหนุ่มคนไหนเมื่อได้พบเห็นก็ไม่อาจละสายตาไปจากเธอได้ เพราะความน่ารักแสนสวยของเธอ แต่แท้จริงแล้วมาโคโตะนั้นเป็นผู้ชายที่แต่งตัวเป็นผู้หญิง! แถมแต่งได้สวยกว่าเด็กนักเรียนหญิงจริง ๆ เสียอีก เรื่องราวชุลมุนของความรักและความเข้าใจผิด ๆ ถูก ๆ ของวัยรุ่น ม.ปลาย จึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!!
description.zh:
花季少女表白温柔女前辈，
谁曾想前辈竟然是男生！？
作为男生的花岗真琴从小喜欢一些可爱的东西，因为外表秀气，他经常把自己装扮为女生。某天，女主苍井咲突然向女装的真琴表白，真琴主动说出自己是男生。苍井咲本以为自己喜欢女生但当得知真琴是男生的这一刻，她下定决心更要主动出击追到真琴！
description.zh-hk: 蒼井咲對一見鍾情的學姊花岡真琴告白後，意外發現對方竟是男兒身。遭到真琴拒絕後，咲沒有放棄追求，反而越挫越勇，並與真琴的青梅竹馬龍二相識。一段特殊的情感在三個人之間蕩漾開來！

altTitles.en: At the North Fort, Happy Days That I Spent With Everyone!

altTitles.id: Nama TerkaitDi Benteng Utara, Hari-hari Bahagia yang Aku Habiskan Bersama Semua Orang!

description.en:
Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball!

A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub, Milfiria. Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother, as she left for the capital. However, unable to bear with the loneliness, she decided to follow her mother but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.
description.ja: 前世日本人、転生したら雪の精霊の子ギツネに!?そんな前世の記憶を持つミルは、同じく精霊の母親と雪の山で平和に暮らしている。ある日、急に留守番を言い渡されて、寂しさに耐えられずミルは山を下りてしまう。動物の本能で人が怖いミルはある砦に辿り着くが、そこで顔に大きな傷のある隻眼の騎士に見つかってしまい…？

altTitles.en: Daily Report About My Witch Senpai

altTitles.de: Meine Kollegin, ihr Besen und ich

description.de: Das Leben als Angstellter ist nicht immer einfach, doch Misono freut sich trotzdem jeden Tag aufs Büro. Denn er arbeitet gemeinsam mit Shizuka, einer besonders freundlichen und hilfsbereiten Kollegin - und Hexe! Mit ihrer Alltagsmagie steht sie ihren Mitmenschen immer zur Seite und erledigt machen unliebsamen Job. Doch Misono macht sich Gedanken, dass Shizukas gutherzige Art von anderen ausgenutzt wird und beschließt, sich ab sofort für sie einzusetzen! Hat er nur einen ausgeprägten Gerechtigkeitssinn oder könnte mehr hinter seiner Sorge stecken?
description.en:
The office stories of a kind hearted, weak-willed, witch senpai and her relatable, straightforward, but kind kouhai that started over a cup of magically warmed coffee.

---
Misono is an office drone with his own ups and downs at work, but thankfully, he has an ally: his senpai Shizuka, who happens to be a witch. Shizuka is always ready to lend a hand to those in need, but Misono thinks she should take better care of herself, since zipping around on a broomstick to run errands can be quite stressful. Is Misono’s over-solicitous concern for Shizuka driven by mere respect for this flustered witch, or could it be more? Let this magical romantic comedy cast its spell on you!

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou wa Slow Life wo Enjoy Shitai! ~Yatto Konyaku Hakisareta no ni, Daini Ouji ga Meccha Stalker Shitekurun desu kedo~

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢はスローライフをエンジョイしたい！～やっと婚約破棄されたのに、第二王子がめっちゃストーカーしてくるんですけど…～

altTitles.vi: Nữ Phản Diện Muốn Tận Hưởng Cuộc Sống Nhàn Nhã! - Vừa Bị Huỷ Hôn, Nhưng Thái Tử Thứ Hai Lại Liên Tục Đeo Bám Tôi

description.en:
"I break off my engagement to you!"

The crown prince threw this line at Sylvie at the school's graduation ceremony, and the villainous daughter Sylvie smiled with satisfaction. With a smile on her face, she says, "Yes! I will gladly accept! I will gladly accept!" She was accused of bullying the Dauphin's girlfriend, but she debunked the allegation with a brilliant alibi: "I was digging radishes in the dungeon." With the fee she had collected and her S-class adventurer's license in hand, Sylvie moved comfortably to a farm.

She is ready to start living the slow life she has dreamed of for so long! But then, the second prince, the brother of her former fiancé, arrives on the scene! It seems that he sees Sylvie as a dangerous person who is avenging the royal family, and he often stays in the house to watch over her...
description.ja:
「やっと来たのね、婚約破棄（待望）の瞬間が…」
「そなたとの婚約は破棄する!」

学園の卒業式で王太子からお約束の台詞を投げつけられた悪役令嬢シルヴィ。彼女は会心の笑みで……「はい! 喜んでお受けします!」と答えた。王太子の恋人へのいじめ疑惑をかけられるも、「ダンジョンで大根を掘っていた」という華麗なアリバイで論破。ふんだくった慰謝料とS級冒険者のライセンスを片手に、シルヴィはとある農場へ悠々と移住する。

かねてからの夢だったスローライフを始めよう! と思いきや、かつての婚約者の弟である第二王子が押し掛けてきた!? どうやらシルヴィを王家に仇なす危険人物として見ているらしく、監視と称してたびたび居座るようになり!?
description.vi: Khoảnh khắc chờ đợi từ lâu để chấm dứt hôn ước cuối cùng đã đến..." "Ta tuyên bố  hủy bỏ hôn ước với cô!" Tại lễ tốt nghiệp của học viện, Silvia, nữ phản diện, được thái tử tuyên bố hủy bỏ hôn ước. Cô trả lời với một nụ cười chân thành... "Tôi xin trân trọng nhận lời" Cô bị buộc tội bắt nạt bạn gái của thái tử, nhưng cô bác bỏ với một chứng cứ tuyệt vời rằng cô đang "đào củ cải trong dungeon." Với phần thưởng hậu hĩnh và giấy phép mạo hiểm giá cấp S, Silvia chuyển đến một trang trại. Khi cô đang nghĩ đến việc bắt đầu cuộc sống chậm rãi mà cô luôn mơ ước, em trai của vị hôn phu cũ, thái tử thứ hai, đã đến! Dường như anh ta coi Silvie là một người nguy hiểm đối với hoàng gia và thường xuyên ở đó dưới danh nghĩa giám sát cô!

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 東大現役合格の秀才・粕壁 隼。ケンカ別れしていた祖母の訃報を聞いて、3年ぶりに海辺の町の古びた実家「カフェテラス・ファミリア」に帰ると、そこには見知らぬ５人の女の子が！ しかも彼女たちは「おばあちゃんの家族」を名乗り…!? 運命の女×５との贅沢すぎる共同生活が始まるっ！『涼風』『君町』『風夏』の瀬尾公治が描く一つ屋根の下ハーレム！ どの娘に恋する？どの娘を愛でる？
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".
description.vi: Kasukabe Hayato đã được nhận vào Đại Học Tokyo ngay trong lần thi đầu tiên. Nhưng sau khi nhận được tin bà nội qua đời, anh trở về ngôi nhà thời thơ ấu của mình, quán cà phê Familia.  Và thấy 5 cô gái lạ mặt tự xưng là "Gia đình của bà"! Cuộc sống mới của Hayato tại một thị trấn ven biển với năm cô gái định mệnh bắt đầu từ đây!
